Class ReportsScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.ReportsScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ReportsScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class. Controls the report screen.

    • countryComboBoxHandler

      public void countryComboBoxHandler(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the country combobox.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When actioned it calls the updateCustomerCountryTable method.

      There is a lambda listener expression on line 533. It is justified because it listens for the mouse click in the country combobox. Then it populates the customer table with customers from that country. It is more efficient to use a lambda for this task.

    • updateCustomerCountryTable

      public void updateCustomerCountryTable(String countryName) throws SQLException
      This method loads customers and their info into the table. This loads customers based on country selected.
      Parameters:
      countryName - The country name that is passed through.

      This table is for the third report that was up to my discretion. I chose to create a report that displays customers based on their country. This method is called in the countryComboBoxHandler method. When a user selects a country from the combobox, this method is called with the specified country. It will load customers from the selected country into the tableview.

      Throws:
      SQLException

    • fillCountryComboBox

      public void fillCountryComboBox() throws SQLException, Exception
      This method populates countryComboBox with all available countries.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      Exception
